experience.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experience.description: We make a real difference by creating exceptional, high-performing web and mobile apps. Our approach is collaborative, transparent and focused on making an impact. We are customer focused, fast growing, IT firm and leader in Designing and Developing Websites, Web Applications, Mobile Applications and any other custom development work. We understand our Clients Requirements and our ability to handle all aspects of Front-end / Back-end Development which includes Clean Designs, Seamless Development Cycle and at last well-documented code. We do not just make a product we make a tool to take your business to another level. We blend the experience, innovation & technology and make a masterpiece for you. We believe in learning much more than winning new. We always keeps our promises regarding timelines.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: We at Goldenflitch are a team of professionals and passion-driven enthusiasts who promise to offer some of the best and out-of-the-box solutions to all your online space requirements. Established with the objective of highlighting that “extra” in your ‘extraordinary’, Goldenflitch is a name that you are looking for those impeccable designs and immaculate craft to mark your online presence. Encapsulating dozens of services, with primary of them being Brand Strategy, Product Design, Identity Design, Usability Test, Design Audit, Packaging, and many more, we commit ourselves to maximize the stature of your brand by enhancing the quality of your online existence. Services and products aren’t the only worthy things your business owns. By understanding and optimizing brand value, you can invest in a compelling strategy for long-term gains. We at Goldenflitch are very particular about your brand and tend to work on product strategy and enhance the user experience to create a long-lasting impression of your brand.

experience.title: Director Of Technology
experience.description: UPAY primarily focuses on providing free of cost education to needy children and conduct recreational activities aimed at broadening the skill set of such children. It was founded by Varun Shrivastava, an IIT Kharagpur student with the help of three other socially motivated Engineers on 20-April-2010. Currently it has 26 centers (9 centers in Nagpur zone, 9 centers in Mouda zone, 3 center in Gurgaon Zone, 1 Delhi, 1 center in Noida, 1 cente in Bangalore and 2 center in Pune Zone ). I have started my journey with volunteer at Upay NCR zone and then promoted to Zonal Coordinator role. I worked as Director(PR) for 1 year and later took the responsibility of Tech in Upay.
